messages.title: A Conservative Majority or a Hung Parliament
messages.content: At the end of this election, we'll either get a Conservative majority or a hung parliament.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Supporting Our NHS and Community Hospital
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Jonathan campaigned for the establishment of the Bradser Hub at our refurbished Community Hospital. He's delighted with the Conservative pledge to spend an extra £33 billion, in cash terms, on our NHS.
Jonathan is passionate about protecting our green spaces for future generations. In Parliament, he has repeatedly pushed for extra protection for Green Belt land.
Jonathan has helped to secure extra government money for local infrastructure. He continues to fight for local road improvements, including for the Victoria Arch scheme.

mentions.tacticalSituation: At the end of this election, we'll either get a Conservative majority or a hung parliament.

quotes.text: John Curtice: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority
Jo Swinson says no to second Tory alliance
Don't risk five long years of Corbyn in charge
